item.title: We want to go beyond intent-to-treat analysis here, but we can’t. Why? Because of this: “Will the data collected for your study be made available to others?” “No”; “Would you like to offer context for your decision?” “–“. Millions of taxpayer dollars spent, and we don’t get to see the data.
